kw.name: Start
kw.doc: Enables the sensors that were selected in the select_sensors() function and then starts data collection.

kw.name: Read
kw.doc: Once the start() function has been called, the device will begin sending data at the specified period. You must call read at least as fast as the period, e.g. once per second for a period of 1000 (ms). The collected data will be added to a value list for each enabled sensor.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.

kw.name: Should Be X Than Y
kw.doc: Checking values within a set range gives reasonable knowledge we PASS the test. Anything above or below this range will fail. This keyword was tested with hot water and ice and would fail this Test when outside range. Range can be adjusted via variables for low_range and high_range which are currently set to 18 and 30

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Number does not match Expression pattern.

kw.name: Stop
kw.doc: Stop data collection on the enabled sensors.

kw.name: Close
kw.doc: Disconnect the USB or BLE device if a device is open.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
